wikipedia_page.main: Emily Flora Klickmann (26 January 1867 – 20 November 1958) was an English journalist, author and editor.  She was the second editor of the Girl's Own Paper, but became best known for her Flower-Patch series of books of anecdotes, autobiography and nature description.

response: *Flora Klickmann — editor of The Girls Own Paper from 1908 to 1931
thumb|Monument to Flora Klickmann (1867–1958), author and editor.

The writer Flora Klickmann (1867–1958), who wrote several popular books about her experiences of living in the Wye valley near Brockweir, is buried in the churchyard of the Moravian Church.Biography of Flora Klickmann at The Orlando Project Subscription required, August 2017
